title: 1.23AMCO懒人包！
txt_content:
本帖最后由 384509230 于 2012-3-24 14:41 编辑 

一个国外很著名的整合包，有N个MOD。安装方法：
1)备份一切! 类型% appdata %的顶端探险家找到任何窗口。 minecraft文件夹。 
备份整个文件夹命名的“minecraft_old”(注:缺乏”。 ”在前面)。 

2) 本币 需要最新的拷贝游戏了! 
有几个插件 本币 ,所以它可能发生冲突的什么事,而是一个新的安装Minecraft。 
登录minecraft.net: http://www.minecraft.net/login.jsp
“运行在浏览器”,探索一个新的世界,持续时间长达数秒钟。 
结果minecraft拯救。 jar文件。 
允许更新 本币 即使基地游戏变化,开始在第三步下次吧。 

3)在得到一份香草的minecraft副本 β1.2.3 … 
下载 本币 1 _2_3启2 c在这里: 本币 1.2.3启2 c
解压缩到任何你喜欢的地方。 
右键单击并选择和“开放与“爪哇。 
(你应该已经爪哇,需要Minecraft跑。) 
安装程序将开始。 默认配置好的工作,所以seledt“下一步”。 
特别感谢Jasertio建设安装!
4)做。 开始游戏,享受一个全新的角度Minecraft ! 
提示:“Recipie书'和'制作指导”是非常有用的。 他们展示如何使一切。 
你应该开始游戏,可以建造新的结合一本书黑色的。 

5)可选的,但 高度 推荐的。 你必须安装这些自己。 
安装 的OptiFine的。 使用或的“天源”或“HD-S”版本。 
然后,你可以开始使用“ 本币 高清数字“纹理包(或负荷属于你自己的高分辨率)。 

6)可选:不喜欢其中的一个插件的吗? 禁用它。 
去.minecraft /配置/ ModLoader.cfg 
改变“mod_ <国防部的名字> =在”到“mod_ <国防部的名字> =关” 
不要删除线。 他们将ModLoader繁殖人类呢,dafalting至“on”。 

已知的错误: 
右键点击在某些怪物(开始“健志郎的国防部)可引起的IC2的崩溃。 
通过看了第一。工作 

有麻烦吗? 论坛也许可以帮助,但错误日志是必需的。 
报告应对虫子的论坛 与一份拷贝或你的错误日志 。 
获得一个错误日志,这批处理文件下载到在任何地方,并运行它 http://dl.dropbox.co...fterrortest.bat
运行测试后的误差批处理文件,日志窗口开启Minecraft并开始。 
将问题再次发生,然后关闭Minecraft。 
日志窗口应该有那么进一步指示给你。 
点击右键,选择的所有,然后键入回车键复制它。 

恢复: (如发生了那件可怕的事情) 
1)删除所有的新方法。 minecraft文件夹。 不要删除文件夹本身,就其内容。 
2)复制所有的minecraft_old文件夹回。 minecraft文件夹。 刚刚搞错了
去杀有道吧

replies.author: zdwk223
replies.txt_content:
找到说明原文了：
Posted 29 April 2011 - 06:04 AM

POPULAR
AMCO: Arrrg's MineCraft Overhaul 
Last Updated: Monday March 26 11:00AM(PST)

What is it: Dozens of the best mods out there, all tested and working together in one download (on Arrrg's system at least).

What's in it: Higher resolution graphics, new art, new minerals, new tools, better landscapes, new plants, more arrows, lots of bug fixes, and tons more. See the "Credits and Content" links below.

Here's a video from AMCO 1.7.3. 

Thank you very much GameGhasKhan!

How to install it:

Thank you very much Chrislaf89!

MAC install video

Thank you very much TechEng!
Note: Arrrg does not own a MAC, so if you do you're kinda on your own.


1) Backup Everything!Type %appdata% at the top of any explorer window to find the .minecraft folder.
Backup the entire folder by renaming it ‘minecraft_old’ (note the lack of ‘.’ at front).

2) AMCO requires a fresh copy of the game!
There are several dozen mods in AMCO, so it is likely to conflict with anything but a fresh install of Minecraft.
Log on to minecraft.net: http://www.minecraft.net/login.jsp
'Run in Browser' and explore a new world for a few seconds.
Save the resulting minecraft.jar file. 
That allows updating AMCO even if the base game changes, and starting at step 3 next time. 

3) After getting a vanilla copy of minecraft of Beta 1.2.3...
Download AMCO 1_2_3 Rev 3a here: AMCO 1.2.3 Rev 3a
Unzip to anywhere you like.
Right-click and select and "Open With" Java.
(You should already have Java, it's required to run Minecraft.)
The installer will start. Defaults configuration sould work, so seledt "Next".
Special thanks to Jasertio for setting up the installer!

4) Done. Start the game and enjoy a whole new aspect of Minecraft! 
Hint: 'Recipie Book' and 'Crafting Guide' are very usefull. They show how to make everything. 
You should start the game with one, and can build new ones by combining a book with black ink. 

5) Optional, but highly reccomended.You'll have to install these yourself.
Install 'OptiFine'. Use either the "HD" or "HD-S" version.
Then, you can start using the "AMCO in HD" texture pack (or load your own high resolution one).

6) Optional: Don't like one of the mods? Disable it.
Go to .minecraft/config/ModLoader.cfg
Change "mod_<mod name>=on" to "mod_<mod name>=off" 
Just don't delete lines. ModLoader will repopulate them, dafalting to "on".

Known Bugs:
Right-clicking on some mobs (to start 'Kenshiro' mod) can cause 'IC2' to crash.
Work-around by looking away first.

ID codes for Flowers were incorrect in Rev2c. Fixed in 3a.

Having Trouble? The forum can probably help, but error logs are required. 
Reports bugs by replying to the forum with a copy or your error log.
To obtain an error log, download this batch file to anywhere and run it http://dl.dropbox.co...fterrortest.bat 
After running the error test batch file, a log window opens and starts Minecraft. 
Make the problem happen again and then close Minecraft. 
The log window should then have further instructions for you.
Right-click, Select All, then hit enter to copy it.

Recovery: (In case something goes horribly wrong)
1) Delete everything from the new .minecraft folder. Don’t delete the folder itself, just the contents.
2) Copy everything from the minecraft_old folder back into the .minecraft folder.

Credits and Contents:
ACMO is created from the fantastic work and written permission from all the modders involved.
Without it none of this would be possible. 
Visit the sights of these hard-working authors, get the most out of AMCO, see where awesomeness is born!

Battle Towers. . . . . .1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Fight monsters by the floor.
Kenshiro Mod. . . . . . 1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Right-click without shirt
Stalker Creeper. . . . .1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Makes Creepers more creepy
Ruins. . . . . . . . . .1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Adds structurs to the world
Better Enchanting. . . .1.2.6. . . xkyouchoux. . . . . . Pick your enchantments
Random Mobs. . . . . . .all. . . . Balthichou. . . . . . Not all mobs look the same
Inventory Tweeks. . . . 1.40b. . . jimeowan. . . . . . . Press R to sort inventory
Red Power 2. . . . . . .pre 4e. . .Eloraam. . . . . . . .Nes redstone circuits, ores, etc.
Industrial Craft 2. . . 1.81. . . .IC2 dev team. . . . . A whole new world of machienes
Simple Harvest Craft. . 1.06. . . .MatrexsVigil. . . . . Lots of new Farming
WeeFlowers. . . . . . . 1.9.9. . . MatrexsVigil. . . . . Adds more flowers
GUI API. . . . . . . . .1.2.3. . . ShaRose. . . . . . . .Required by 'Coral'
Coral Reefs. . . . . . .1.2.3. . . q3hardcore. . . . . . Adds coral reefs

To anyone that are having the crash screen :
Delete the Pam's Weee! Flowers 1.9.9 (MC 1.2.3).zip in the mods folder !!!
I fixed the error : )

384509230 发表于 2012-4-2 14:42 
那你能帮忙发上来木……555555我给你加分
我是这样弄的新建个bat文件里面写
@echo off
java -Xincgc -Xmx1g -jar 文件名.jar gui
pause
貌似文件名不能有空格，运行bat就是安装界面了
还有前楼有人说的的要删去某个MOD才能正常运行游戏
